title: Portfolio Data
description: Configuration file for your Wii-themed portfolio. Edit portfolio.json to customize your portfolio content.

_README.description: Optional field for documentation reference (ignored by the app)

user.description: Your personal information displayed in the About Me section

bio.description: A short bio about yourself (1-2 sentences)
examples: Passionate developer building amazing web experiences

avatar.description: Path to your avatar image. Place image in /public/images/ folder

social.description: Your social media and contact links (all fields optional)

github.description: Full URL to your GitHub profile

linkedin.description: Full URL to your LinkedIn profile

twitter.description: Full URL to your Twitter/X profile

website.description: Full URL to your personal website

projects.description: List of your projects. These appear in the channel views based on their category.

id.description: Unique identifier for the project (use lowercase with hyphens)

title.description: Project name displayed as the heading

description.description: Longer description of the project (2-4 sentences)
examples: This project helps developers manage their tasks efficiently...

techStack.description: List of technologies used in the project

category.description: Which channel(s) this project appears in. Valid values: 'web-apps', 'open-source', 'creative-lab', 'archive'

featured.description: If true, project appears in the featured/recruiter view (optional, defaults to false)

theme.description: Theme identifier (keep as 'wii' for this template)
